titleStmt.title: The cherrie and the slaye. Composed into Scottis meeter, by Alexander Montgomerie
titleStmt.author: Montgomerie, Alexander, 1545?-1598.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed be Robert VValde-graue printer to the Kings Majestie,
